instruction:
Given a brain Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) radiology report, determine whether the patient has acute ischemic stroke (AIS).
Return your answer in the following format. DO NOT GIVE ANY EXPLANATION:
AIS: label
The optional list for "label" is ["Yes", "No"].
input:
No diffusion restriction

Multiple old small infarcts in both cerebral periventricular deep white matter.
magnetic resonance angiography: No gross abnormal finding.

instruction:

Return your answer in the following format. DO NOT GIVE ANY EXPLANATION:
AIS: label

input:

magnetic resonance angiography: No gross abnormal finding.
